What are the treatments for Klver-Bucy Syndrome ?,"Treatment is symptomatic and supportive, and may include drug therapy.",NINDS,Klver-Bucy Syndrome
What is the outlook for Klver-Bucy Syndrome ?,"There is no cure for Klver-Bucy
